abstract: If there were any doubts that about whether BlackRock had considered a takeover of the Man Group, the world’s largest hedge fund, the U.S. asset manager’s chief put them to rest: “We have never, ever looked at Man Group,” Laurence D. Fink told Les Echos.

lead_paragraph: If there were any doubts about whether BlackRock had considered a takeover of the Man Group, the the British hedge fund giant, BlackRock’s chief put them to rest.
